tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory (
    component_id INT,
    component_type VARCHAR,
    quantity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (component_id) REFERENCES tires(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (component_id) REFERENCES chains(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (component_id) REFERENCES pedals(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE chains (
   chain_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   chain_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   chain_material VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   chain_length INT,
   chain_stock INT
);

CREATE TABLE pedals (
   pedal_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   pedal_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   pedal_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   pedal_color VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   pedal_stock INT
);

CREATE TABLE frames (
   frame_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   frame_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   frame_material VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   frame_size VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
   frame_stock INT
);

CREATE TABLE seats (
   seat_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   seat_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   seat_material VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   seat_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   seat_stock INT
);
